Title: 62. Amok
Text:
Angela was ambushed somewhere near Aerilon castle, when she was being evacuated.
I must know if it really was an ambush!

pages:
{"text":"Subject got dragged into our village by Hunter.

Hunter claims he jumped down the cliff right into the river.

He unconcious since the moment Hunter got him out of the river.

He seems to be extremely exhausted."}

{"text":"I failed to find anything about his symptoms.

Subject seems to be very combat-capable.
Maybe soldier or sellsword?

Subject is becoming quite popular in the village."}
{"text":"The subject have shown that he is skilled tracer and diplomat.\nIt is kind of scary to watch him skillfuly pass every obstacle there is in front of him..."}
{"text":"I worry that I have to put finding of the cure for later, since we were called to help in Aramoor."}

{"text":"It seems that my worst nightmare come true.
Undead are here!

I must know!
Subject have agreed to drink potion I prepare for him.

It should show if my worries are justify."}
{"text":"Subject have consumed the potion and now is uncouncious.\n\nI am wathcing his vital functions and wait."}
{"text":"He woke up, saying he seen two persons sitting on the throne commanding undead.\n\nHe said he did not recognised them."}
{"text":"A war is here and we have been parted.\n\nI can not watch over the Subject for the moment. He is on his own."}

{"text":"I can not keep it any longer! But there is nobody I can tell anything. I must wait for the Subject, Hunter or Bernard to return. Then I am going to tell them what troubles me.\n\nI hope they will be able to forgive me for it..."}
tag.author: Angela
tag.title: Subject
